abstracts.cdata!:
The Fourth Highway Project will consist
            of: (a) road betterment program: paving and improving of
            fourteen earth or gravel roads totalling about 925 km;
            repaving and improving of four paved roads totalling about
            390 km; and upgrading of two roads to four-lane highways
            totalling about 36 km; (b) Regional agricultural development
            study: preparation of regional studies for agricultural
            development in Northern Argentina; (c) preparation of a
            national transport plan; and (d) preparation of a pavement
            overlay study and a traffic safety program.
